example.code:
$newAttribute = New-Object Amazon.ElasticLoadBalancingV2.Model.LoadBalancerAttribute $newAttribute.Key = 'deletion_protection.enabled' $newAttribute.Value = 'true' Edit-ELB2LoadBalancerAttribute -LoadBalancerArn 'arn:aws:elasticloadbalancing:us-east-1:123456789012:loadbalancer/app/test-alb/3651b4394dd9a24f' -Attribute $newAttribute -Region us-east-1
Key Value --- ----- deletion_protection.enabled true access_logs.s3.enabled false access_logs.s3.bucket access_logs.s3.prefix idle_timeout.timeout_seconds 60 routing.http2.enabled true routing.http.drop_invalid_header_fields.enabled false
example.description: This example modifes the Attributes of the specified load balancer.
